description:
Misaki fights her first match against a Deus who is her physical opposite. A storm causes issues with the Layer.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: O Sistema Caiu?! Uma Batalha Na Tempestade!
System Down! Combat décisif sur un bateau en pleine tempête.
System Down!? Arashi no Senjou Kessen!
System Down? A Battle Onboard a Boat Amidst a Storm
システムダウン!? 嵐の船上決戦!
